CustomField.description: If there are multiple filters, this field determines how they work together to determine visibility. Looks like this: (1 AND 2) means that both the filter with Number__c 1 and the one with Number__c 2 have to evaluate to true. You can nest them as much as you want. If you con't fill this field out, all filters are linked together with AND.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If there are multiple filters, this field determines how they work together to determine visibility. Looks like this: (1 AND 2) means that both the filter with Number__c 1 and the one with Number__c 2 have to evaluate to true. You can nest them as much as you want. If you con't fill this field out, all filters are linked together with AND.
CustomField.label: Filter logic
